titleStmt.title: A tryal of witches at the assizes held at Bury St. Edmonds for the count of Suffolk on the tenth day of March, 1664 [i.e 1665] before Sir Matthew Hale, Kt., then Lord Chief Baron of His Majesties Court of Exchequer / taken by a person then attending the court.
titleStmt.author: Cullender, Rose, d. 1665.
Duny, Amy, d. 1663.

England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (Suffolk)
